title: The Financial Statements Data Domain Schema
description: Contains a list of the financial statements, like balance sheets, income statements, cash flow or ratios, available to get for an entity

FinancialStatementsList.title: List of Financial Statements' general info
FinancialStatementsList.description: List of Financial Statements' of an entity, including only the main info (not the values), sorted by period

Year.title: Statements year
Year.description: In case of a yearly period, indicated the year when statements facts happened

Type.title: Statements type
Type.description: Shows the statements type, usually Annual Accounts

PeriodType.title: Period type
PeriodType.description: The span of time covered by a set of financial statements

PeriodDesc.title: Period description
PeriodDesc.description: In case of any period different from yearly, it is used for the period description value

FilingDate.title: Date of Filing
FilingDate.description: Date of filing of the current statements

StartingDate.title: Starting date
StartingDate.description: Initial date of the current statements

ClosingDate.title: Closing date
ClosingDate.description: Closing date of the current statements

Format.title: Statements format
Format.description: Specific format of the rule used to fill the statements

IsConsolidated.title: Is consolidated
IsConsolidated.description: True if the statements are consolidated instead of individual accounts

IsAvailable.title: Is available
IsAvailable.description: True if the statements' content has been processed and it is available for the end consumer

IsUpdateable.title: Is updateable
IsUpdateable.description: True if the statements are not currently available for the end consumer but they may be ordered and processed under request (in some scenarios)

IsNotOfficial.title: Is not official
IsNotOfficial.description: True if the statements were not obtained from an official source

IncludeAttachments.title: Include attachments
IncludeAttachments.description: True if the original document with the statements (PDF, image) is included

PublicationVendorReferenceId.title: Publication Vendor Reference Id
PublicationVendorReferenceId.description: External Id used to point to the source reference of the filing event

StatementsVendorReferenceId.title: Statements Vendor Reference Id
StatementsVendorReferenceId.description: External Id used to point to the source reference of the statements data
